name: deism

the belief in a single god who created the world but does not act to influence events: Deism is a philosophical system that acknowledges God, but considers him a passive observer of his creation. Deism could be seen as a kind of compromise between faith and science. Related word

In fact, Deism contends that God has nothing to do with religion.Many regarded deism as an ill-conceived attempt to reconcile religion with scientific discoveries.
